App Content.Title: ATC Training
App Content.Description/Objective: Welcome to ATC Training. Through a series of interaactive exercises you'll learn how to communicate with Air Traffic Control effectively.

App Content.Title: ATC Training
App Content.Description/Objective: Master aviation radio communications with interactive exercises

App Content.Title: VFR Training
App Content.Description/Objective: VFR communications training for student and seasoned pilots.

App Content.Title: IFR Training
App Content.Description/Objective: IFR communications training for student and seasoned pilots.

Subsections.Description/Objective: Visual Flight Rules communications training for student and seasoned pilots.
Learn proper communication for ground operations before takeoff
Phraseology for contacting ATC and requesting flight following
Requesting permission to enter different airspace classes
Requesting and receiving a clearance from Clearance Delivery
IFR takeoff clearances and departure frequency changes
Departure procedure communications and initial climb instructions
Requesting altitude changes, deviations, and route modifications
Handling ATC instructions, clearances, and frequency changes
Requesting approach type and arrival procedures
Receiving and acknowledging approach clearances and instructions
Landing clearances and runway exit instructions

Lessons.Title: Self announce Taxi
Lessons.Objective: Practice announcing taxi intentions to the runway in use at a non-towered airport.

Lessons.Title: Basic Taxi Request
Lessons.Objective: Practice receiving and accurately reading back basic taxi routing instructions to navigate from a parking location to the active runway.

Lessons.Title: Complex Taxi Request
Lessons.Objective: Practice taxi-out requests and clearances, including hold-short instructions and runway crossing authorizations.
